about_section.description: Villa Laki is a family-owned, modern apartment house in the heart of Rab island. With its direct beachfront location, breathtaking views, and personalized services, we welcome our guests all year round.

diving_section.description: Discover the crystal clear waters of Rab island with Kron Diving, located just a short distance from Villa Laki. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced diver, we offer a variety of diving courses and experiences.

locations.title: Diving Spots
locations.description: Explore beautiful diving spots around Rab island, including wrecks and underwater caves.

amenities_section.internet_description: Free WiFi is available throughout the property.
amenities_section.parking_description: Free private parking is possible on site (no reservation needed).

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in is available from 14:00, and check-out is until 10:00. If you need to arrive or depart at different times, please let us know in advance.

questions.question: Is there free parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide free private parking for our guests on the property. No reservation is needed.

questions.question: Do you accept credit cards?
questions.answer: Yes, we accept Visa and Mastercard. Cash payments and bank transfers are also possible.

questions.question: Are pets allowed?
questions.answer: Yes, pets are welcome with prior arrangement. Please inform us if you're planning to bring a pet.

questions.question: Is there air conditioning?
questions.answer: Yes, all our rooms are equipped with individually controlled air conditioning units.

questions.question: How far is the beach?
questions.answer: Our private beach area is directly in front of the property, approximately 50 meters from the apartments.

things_to_do_section.description: Discover the best of Rab island: beaches, culture, nature, gastronomy and active adventures for all ages!

items.title: Sandy beaches
items.desc: Rab is famous for its crystal-clear, shallow sandy beaches like Paradise Beach and Livačina.

items.title: Old Town & Churches
items.desc: Stroll through Rab's historic old town, discover the four bell towers and medieval churches.

items.title: Festivals & Events
items.desc: Join the Rapska Fjera medieval festival, fishermen's nights or knight tournaments.

items.title: Boat trips
items.desc: Explore nearby islands, bays and the sea on organized boat or sailing tours.

items.title: Active adventures
items.desc: Go cycling, hiking, kayaking or try water sports all around Rab island!

items.title: Gastronomy & Rab cake
items.desc: Taste local cuisine, the famous Rab cake, cheeses and wines in island restaurants.

items.title: Nature & viewpoints
items.desc: Hike to Kamenjak viewpoint or explore the island's green bays and forests.

items.title: Nightlife
items.desc: Enjoy Rab town's bars, open-air concerts and summer events.
